      • cheakPin

        public boolean cheakPin(java.lang.String pIN)
        This function check if the parameter is equal to pin.
        参数:
        pin - The string which you want to check.
        返回:
        If the parameter is equal to pin, returns true.

      • depositByCash

        public int depositByCash(double amount)
        This function deposit money to cash.
        参数:
        the - amount of money you want to deposit
        返回:
        if deposit successfully return 0, else return 1 for having been suspended 2 for error input

      • depositByCheque

        public int depositByCheque(double amount)
        This function deposit money to cheque.
        参数:
        the - amount of money you want to deposit
        返回:
        if deposit successfully return 0, else return 1 for having been suspended, 2 for wrong input

      • withdraw

        public int withdraw(double amount)
        This function withdraw money
        参数:
        the - amount of money you want to withdraw
        返回:
        if deposit successfully return 0, else return 1 for having been suspended, 2 for wrong input, 3 for too no enough money

        This function is used to suspend an account
